sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container,Row,Col } from "reactstrap"; import './form.css' function UpdateForm(){ const [image,setImage]=useState('') const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', city: '', address: '', distance: '', price: '', maxGroupSize: '', desc: '', photo: null, featured: false, }); const [objectId, setObjectId] = useState(''); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setObjectId(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = () => { console.log('ObjectId:', objectId); }; return <>
